phrs.translation: 变戏法, 魔法伎俩, 手法敏捷, 戏法

sentences.sentence: Magic can be a lifetime hobby and card magic is the poetry of prestidigitation.
sentences.translation: 魔术可以是终身爱好，并且卡片魔术是戏法诗歌。

sentences.sentence: The Nolan who revelled in stunning imagery was becoming a magical manipulator—something that he celebrated in “The Prestige” (2006), which turned prestidigitation into an end in itself.
sentences.translation: 当诺兰陶醉在那些令人眼花缭乱的影像中时，他已渐渐成为了一个幻术操控师----如同他在"致命魔术"（2006年）中宣扬的那些一样，但最终把这些魔法伎俩带入深渊。

sentences.sentence: The Nolan who revelled in stunning imagery was becoming a magical manipulator-something that he celebrated in "The Prestige" (2006), which turned prestidigitation into an end in itself.
sentences.translation: 当诺兰陶醉在那些令人眼花缭乱的影像中时，他已渐渐成为了一个幻术操控师——如同他在“致命魔术”(2006年)中宣扬的那些一样，但最终把这些魔法伎俩带入深渊。
